title: Arnhem Land (A)
creator_credit: Charles P. Mountford and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Records the 1948 joint Australian-American expedition to Arnhem Land. Shows field work of scientists collecting specimens of insects, birds, fish, mammals, flowers, vegetation, rock structures, aboriginal paintings and carvings, etc. Several scenes show aborigines in ceremonial rituals, including the dances of the great kangaroo, the water snake, and the wild honey dances. Photographed by Peter Bassett-Smith, with music by Alfred F. Hill.
